#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
#define sc(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define scl(n) scanf("%lld",&n)
#define prt(n) printf("%lld\n",n)
#define mod 1000000007
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int n,t;
	ll x;
	//freopen("in.txt","r",stdin);
	sc(t);
	int i;
	ll ans=1;
	while(t--)
	{
		ans=1;
		sc(n);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scl(x);
			x=x%mod;
			ans=(x*ans)%mod;
			ans=ans%mod;		
		}
		prt(ans);
	}
return 0;
}
